New Records: Rilee Rossouw scored 109 off 56 balls, his best T20I score
Anrich Nortje took four wickets in quick succession, his best T20I figures
Key Match Events: Rilee Rossouw scored a wonderful ton and helped his team get over 200
Anrich Nortje took two wickets in his first over and four wickets overall
Taskin Ahmed was run out by Rabada
Post-Match Reflections: Rilee Rossouw is the Player of the Match
A comprehensive win for the Proteas, they dominated in all three departments and with such a huge margin win, they boost their net run rate
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Sydney Cricket Ground
South Africa go on top of group 2 with this win
